Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits increase in maximum rents unless essential tenant services are maintained
Summary: Prohibits any increase in the average monthly rental of a property by a limited-profit housing company unless the appropriate local housing agency certifies that there exists no recorded violations against such property or that all recorded violations have been cleared, corrected or abated, and that such company is maintaining all essential services required to be furnished.
LawCode: Amd ยง31, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to prohibiting increases in maximum rents for dwellings unless all essential services are maintained and requiring certification of other conditions
